keyword: how many calories in diet cola
title: How Many Calories in Diet Cola?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in diet cola per can, including full nutrition breakdown, zero-sugar facts, and common variations for your diet tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Diet Cola?
assumptions: Standard 12 oz (355 ml) can of diet cola, artificially sweetened, zero-calorie formula; no added flavors or mix-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, formulation, and serving size; always check labels for exact values as sweeteners and sodium can differ.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz can of diet cola contains 0 calories and 0 g sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular cola (full sugar version)
Add a splash of fruit juice (1 oz per can)

faqs.q: How many calories in a can of diet cola?
faqs.a: Typically 0 calories in a 12 oz can of diet cola.

faqs.q: Does diet cola have any carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No carbs or sugars; it's sweetened with artificial zero-calorie sweeteners.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in diet cola?
faqs.a: About 40 mg per 12 oz can, varying by brand.

faqs.q: Is diet cola truly zero calories?
faqs.a: Yes, most brands are 0 kcal, but trace amounts under 5 kcal may not be listed.

faqs.q: How does diet cola compare to regular cola calories?
faqs.a: Diet has 0 kcal vs. about 140 kcal in regular 12 oz cola due to sugar.
